id.description: The unique identifier for this billable rate.

parent_id.description: The identifier of the parent resource associated with this rate.

amount.description: The billable amount associated with this rate.

start_date.description: The start date for this billable rate period.

end_date.description: The end date for this billable rate period.

created_at.description: The date and time when this rate was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when this rate was last updated.
